data.question: What is the empirical formula of compound 2a?
What is the yield of urea 2a when synthesized using sodium magnesiate 1 as a catalyst?
Does the presence of NHPh2 increase the yield of isocyanurate 5a in the trimerization process?
What is the role of amine in the hydroamination reaction conditions according to the text?
data.answer: The role of the amine is to generate in situ the active species 3 which can then undergo subsequent insertion reactions with pTolNCO to give 5a.

data.question: What is the crystal system of compound 5a?
Is the reaction of pTolNCO with sodium magnesiate 1 in the presence of NHPh2 more effective for isocyanurate 5a formation than without NHPh2?
What is the yield of isocyanurate 5b when synthesized using sodium magnesiate 3-(THF)2 as a catalyst?
Can sodium magnesiate 3-(THF)2 effectively promote the trimerization of arylisocyanates at room temperature?
What is the yield of urea 2b when synthesized using sodium magnesiate 1 as a catalyst?
What is the main problem in cyclotrimerization processes as mentioned in the text?
data.answer: The need for severe reaction conditions, limited selectivity with formation of byproducts, and limited functional group tolerance.

data.question: Is the formation of isocyanurate 5a from pTolNCO catalyzed by sodium magnesiate 1 without NHPh2 efficient?
What is the yield of isocyanurate 5c when synthesized using sodium magnesiate 3-(THF)2 as a catalyst?
Does the presence of NHPh2 facilitate protonolysis of some of the insertion intermediates in the trimerization process?
What is the yield of urea 2c when synthesized using sodium magnesiate 1 as a catalyst?
What is the role of sodium magnesiate 3-(THF)2 in the trimerization of arylisocyanates?
data.answer: It can effectively promote the trimerization of arylisocyanates at room temperature in a selective manner without forming other oligomers.

data.question: Is the reaction of pTolNCO with sodium magnesiate 1 in the absence of NHPh2 effective for isocyanurate 5a formation?
What is the yield of isocyanurate 5d when synthesized using sodium magnesiate 3-(THF)2 as a catalyst?
Does sodium magnesiate 3-(THF)2 show high selectivity in the trimerization process of arylisocyanates?
What is the yield of urea 2d when synthesized using sodium magnesiate 1 as a catalyst?
What challenges are associated with the catalytic transformation of isocyanates to isocyanurates as mentioned in the text?
data.answer: The need for severe reaction conditions, limited selectivity with formation of byproducts, and limited functional group tolerance.
